channel.title: The DLite House Music Podcast
channel.description:
Uplifting, Progressive, House, Electro, Nu disco, Tech House...this podcast covers a lot of ground with one common thread: Sets that make you wanna move anyway you know how. Direct from the world of House music to your iPod, no talking just pure quality house! Pushing the music out to 60+ different countries, 6500 subscribers and posting over 10 000 downloads a month this is surely an up and comer not to be missed. Be a part of the global audience and check it out!
Want to book me for your show or event?
Drop me an email at therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: DLite's Essential Prydz
item.description: As far as personal favourites go, Eric Prydz is at the very top of my all time list. His music has always spoken to me on a level none other has been able to. All at the same time his music is the essence of progressive house, it is melodic, it is soulful, it is deep, it exudes all kinds of energy, it makes you want to dance, it relaxes you, it takes you to another place and it is the ultimate big room house music sound. This episode contains what I consider to be the ‘Essential Prydz’ tracks. I hope I was able to express in this mix what the music has always meant to me…and I hope you get as much enjoyment and as many good feelings as I do when you listen to it. He is one of the absolute best and most talented artists electronic music has to offer and this mix will give you a small taste of what is possible. Enjoy and get your groove on with these Prydz hot tracks: 1. Pryda “Balaton” 2. Eric Prydz “RYMD” 3. Pryda “Lift” 4. Pryda “Rakfunk” 5. Pryda “With Me” 6. Eric Prydz “Aftermath (Extended mix) 7. Switch “A Bit Patchy” (Eric Prydz remix) 8. M83 “Midnight City” (Eric Prydz ‘Private’ remix) 9. Pryda “Armed” 10. Paolo Mojo “1983” (Eric Prydz remix) 11. Eric Prydz “Pjanoo” 12. Pryda “Muranyi” 13. Pryda “Melo” 14. Eric Prydz “2Night” If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. HELP cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show your support for the Podcast: http://bit.ly/dEIO8s Pretty please…EVERY BIT HELPS! =) 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store http://bit.ly/eV5RtB so you never miss an episode! For those keeping track: you are now part of 5000+ subscribers who are downloading the podcasts into over 65 different countries around the world! For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Fresh Air Vol. 1
item.description: Welcome to ANOTHER DLite series! This one is titled “Fresh Air”. The goal here is to find FRESH quality house music and push it around the globe as an antidote of sorts. An antidote to what? Lately it feels like almost anywhere you look there is a Skrillex wannabe just waiting to smash you in the face with some obnoxious electro. Either that or producers are lining up to try and pass off recycled hooks and drops as “new and amazing” tracks. All sounds the same…and the masses are devouring it as if it’s innovative new stuff. DLite is here with Volume 1 of FRESH AIR to remind you there is still quality house music out there. There are still producers and DJs making tracks that you can groove to and that are so good you can’t resist the pull of the dance floor. I wanted to mix a set that shows there are old school remixes worth moving to and songs from back in the day worth revisiting. Prove that there are tracks with the magic disco touch that we still can’t resist. Shed some light on progressive that still takes you to another more relaxing place. There are tracks with unique combinations of hip hop, electro, soul and funk that offer a FRESH perspective on electronic music. I’m trying to give you something unique to help you through the overwhelming mass of SAME. Want different? You’ll love this. Avoid the sheep and go your own way. ROCK these hot tracks: 1. House Repulic “Nuggetz” 2. Cevin Fisher/Seamus Haji “I Love The Music” (Manuel De La Mare & Alex Kenji remix) 3. Richard Grey “Lady” (Federico Scavo remix) 4. Gramophonedzie “Number One” 5. Soul Central “Strings of Life” (Supernova remix) 6. Sebastien Drums ft. Niles Mason “French Rules” (Muzzaik remix) 7. Oliver Twizt “Love Trip” (Olav Basoski remix) 8. Sak Noel “Loca People” (Summertime remix) 9. TJR “Funky Vodka” 10. NTFO & Rhadow “Don’t Stop” 11. Coll Selini & John Harris “Essential Love” 12. Vitodito & Oza “Kawaii” (Re-Lectro Extended mix) 13. Adrian Lux “Teenage Crime” 14. Joe Garston “The Promise” 15. Sebastian Krieg “Rei” If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Help me cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show your support for the Podcast: http://bit.ly/dEIO8s 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store http://bit.ly/eV5RtB so you never miss an episode! For those keeping track: you are now part of 5000+ subscribers who are downloading the podcasts into over 65 different countries around the world! For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: DLite's Deep Cuts Vol. 2
item.description: Welcome to the second installment of DLite’s Deep Cuts – bringing you all the smooth, soulful, funky and dope baselines Deep House has to offer. Vol. 2 definitely sees a turn to the sexier side of Deep House…and it’s a sure thing that DLite will get your hips moving by the time all is said and done! Enjoy the vibe and let it teach you how to kick back in a whole new way… Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/therealdlite Your list of DEEP CUTS is here: 1. Joris Voorn & Moby “After the After” (Original mix) 2. Flight Facilities ft. Jess “Foreign Language” (Will Saul & Tam Cooper mix) 3. SCB “Loss” (Original mix) 4. Inkfish “Loving” (Original mix) 5. Infinity Ink “Games” (Original mix) 6. Mr. V “I Can Sing” (Original mix) 7. Frej Le Vin & Ann-Sofie Rokboel “My Silly Ibiza Dream” (Original mix) 8. Larse “So Long” (Original mix) 9. Aki Bergen ft. Lazarusman “Get Better” (Original mix) 10. Kellerkind “Backflash” (Original mix) 11. Epithet “Bluenote” (Roberto Rodriguez remix) 12. Todd Terje “Inspector Norse” (Original mix) 13. Pleasurekraft “The Main Ingredient” (Original mix) 14. Martin Roth “Alacati” (Original mix) 15. Fred Falke “808 PM At The Beach” (Original mix) If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Help me cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show your support for the Podcast: http://bit.ly/dEIO8s 2. item.title: Episode 29 (December 2011)
item.description: Has been only a few weeks since our last Episode, but in the Spirit of the Season another episode is already to go! More along traditional lines for this podcast there’s a bit of everything in here. Starts out funky with a good dose of attitude…but part way through there is a distinct shift in gears. Get ready to scratch that dancin’ itch because this one’s gonna make you SHAKE IT. Not to worry, the finish will let you down gently... As always, hope you enjoy it and this gives you all the energy you need to get you through the holidays! Merry Christmas!! Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/therealdlite Ho-Ho-Hot Track Listing: 1. Maceo Plex “Falling” (Original mix) 2. Kid Crème “Austin’s Groove” (Vocal mix) 3. Shakedown “At Night” (Kid Crème club mix) 4. Chromeo ft. Elly Jackson “Hot Mess” (Duck Sauce remix) 5. David Jones w Diva & Jones “Feellove” (Original mix) 6. Yolanda Be Cool ft. Crystal Waters “Le Bump” (Original mix) 7. EDX “D.A.N.C.E” (Original mix) 8. Morgan Page ft. Tegan & Sara “Body Work” (Original mix) 9. Michael Calfan “Resurrection” (Axwell’s Recut club version) 10. Rihanna ft. Calvin Harris “We Found Love” (Original mix) 11. Avicii “Levels” (Original mix) 12. Kaskade ft. Marcus Bentley “Let Me Go” (Original mix) 13. Kaskade ft. Mindy Gledhill “Eyes” (Original mix) 14. Eric Prydz “2nite” (Original mix) 15. Ad Brown & Ben Coda “Timeless” (Dinka Mystic Piano remix) If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. item.title: DLite's Deep Cuts Vol. 1
item.description: Welcome to the new project! DLite’s Deep Cuts are an attempt to bring you all the smooth, soulful, funky and dope baselines Deep House has to offer. This is a sweet change of pace. It’s a different side of DLite and will be making appearances alongside other episode styles you’ve come to love. Enjoy this mix and look for two more to drop before Christmas! DEEP Tracklist here: 1. Cosmic Kids “Reginald’s Groove” (Classixx remix) 2. Martin Dawson “Sunday Smoking” (Jay Shepheard remix) 3. Vindahl “Sometimes” (12” Groove mix) 4. Solomun “Love Recycled 1” (Original mix) 5. Lovebirds ft. Stee Downes “Want You In My Soul” (Original mix) 6. Deep Mind “True” (Original mix) 7. Chris Lattner & Enzo Siragusa “Jazz Fusic” (Original mix) 8. Felix Cage “Mascarade” (Rodriguez Jr. remix) 9. Zoe Xenia “Right Here Feels So Good” (Original mix) 10. Frankie Knuckles ft. Jaime Principle “I’ll Take You There” (Director’s Cut) 11. Mark Romboy “Castillo” (Original mix) 12. Sinc & Daniel Sanchez “New Day” (Original mix) 13. Benoit & Sergio “Everybody” (Original mix) If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. item.title: Episode 28 (August 2011)
item.description: Lots of funky house in the first half of this one…but make no mistake, after the midway mark we turn up the heat! The idea here is to give you a great all around set that will carry you through the rest of your summer. It contains all of my favourites from this summer season’s nights out so far and I hope you can feel that happy, summer vibe shining through. Use it to fire up your backyard BBQs, afternoons on the boat, house party nights, slow afternoons at work…really, it should be used whenever you need to get your blood pumping and jump-start your day! Enjoy the next few months of sunshine! Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/therealdlite …and for Event Information watch http://www.revolveevents.com **See you August 4th at Fire N Ice Restolounge in Calgary for a night of quality house…all night! Tracklisting for this second helping of hot summer tracks: 1. The Six Million Dollar DJ “We Love You Michael” (Original mix) 2. Foster The People “Pumped Up Kicks” (Gigamesh remix) 3. Olav Basoski “New Day” (Original mix) 4. Alex Kenji, Federico Scavo “Get Funky” (Original mix) 5. Tom Novy ft. Michael Marshall “Your Body” (Lissat & Voltaxx mix) 6. Spencer & Hill “Can’t Stop the World” (Crazibiza remix) 7. Dave Kurtis, Mauro Modello “Killer” (Pink Fluid remix) 8. Sneaky Sound System “Pictures” (Tonite Only remix) 9. Alex Kenji, Starkillers, Nadia Ali “Pressure” (Alesso remix) 10. Kaskade ft. Mindy Gledhill “All That You Give” (J. Michael & Kemal mix) 11. Florence & The Machine “You’ve Got The Love” (Mark Knight remix) 12. Mike Balance “Energy” (Original mix) 13. Ralph Good ft. Polina Griffith “SOS” (Original mix) 14. Young Rebels, Francesco Diaz, David Costa “Barcelona” (Original mix) 15. Ruben Alvarez, Yves Murasca ft. Gran Purismo “We All The Same” (Murasca & Alvarez mix) 16. Sultan, BT, Morgan Page, Ned Shepard “In The Air” (Extended mix) 17. Dinka “Constant Sorrow” (Original mix) If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Help me cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show your support for the Podcast: http://bit.ly/dEIO8s 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store http://bit.ly/eV5RtB so you never miss an episode! For those keeping track: you are now part of 5000+ subscribers who are downloading the podcasts into over 65 different countries around the world! For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 27 (June 2011)
item.description: As if you need any excuse to rock your hot summer nights. Now when you do, you’ve got the soundtrack: DLite’s Episode 27. This is a cracker of a mix: funky, sexy big sounds. The perfect backdrop for your sunny summer days and hot summer nights…put it to good use! Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/therealdlite …and for Event Information watch http://www.revolveevents.com Listen lots, let DLite smash the party and tell all your friends who’s rockin’ the decks. Wishing I could be there to have a beer in the sun with many of you, but in the absence of that, here’s a collection of HOT tracks to take my place: 1. The BPA ft. Iggy Pop “He’s Frank (Slight Return)” (Twelves remix) 2. Bingo Players “Cry (Just a Little)” (Original mix) 3. Max Vangeli ft. Max C “Look Into Your Heart” (C. Lewis & M. Danielle remix) 4. item.title: Episode 26 (April 2011) - Spring Is In The Air
item.description: Although warmer seasons seem to be late arriving where I am (*ahem, this bitch Winter can piss off already), the thoughts of Spring alone are already warming all of us up! Using that as inspiration I put this episode together for April of 2011. All of the tracks are upbeat and original sounds, playful tracks that have the necessary touch of soul. Thinking of you all down in Miami this week. Looking forward to all the momentum you create for this wicked music and excited to ride the wave into an amazing summer!! Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/therealdlite Here we go! With thoughts of warmer weather, less clothing, beaches, sunshine and uplifting summer house, here’s April 2011’s hot tracklisting: 1. Mac Zimms “My Feelings” (Original mix) 2. Groove Armada ft. Fenech Soler and SaintSaviour “Paper Romance” (Urchins mix) 3. Flo Rida “Who Dat Girl” (Denis Koyu remix) 4. David Penn ft. Monia Amore “Ocean Drive” (Vocal mix) 5. TV Rock, Hook N Sling ft. Rudy “Diamonds In The Sky” (Original mix) 6. Sultan, Ned Shepard ft. Nadia Ali “Call My Name” (Spencer & Hill remix) 7. Patric La Funk, Fedde Le Grand “Autosave” (Original mix) 8. Pnau “With You Forever” (Dirty South remix) 9. Sebastian Drums, Avicii “Snus” (Green & Falkner remix) 10. Mord Fustang “The Electric Dream” (Original mix) 11. Diddy – Dirty Money ft. Skylar Grey “Coming Home” (Dirty South remix) 12. David Tort ft. Gosha “One Look” (Axwell vs. Dimitri Vegas & Like Mike remix) 13. Mord Fustang “Milky Way” (Original mix) Stay tuned for upcoming theme episodes dedicated to EDX and Deadmau5. No shortage of material from either one is sure to make for jam-packed hours of good music. Don’t forget to check out my side project of Revolve Sunday Sessions…free new podcast helping you recover on Sundays =) Access it directly on iTunes here: http://bit.ly/fvRiI8 and check out it’s webpage here: http://revolvesundaysessions.podomatic.com I’ll post the first few volumes here in a few weeks as a bonus download…and of course as a reminder to subscribe to the new podcast! If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Help me cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show your support for the Podcast: http://bit.ly/dEIO8s 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store http://bit.ly/eV5RtB so you never miss an episode! For those keeping track: you are now part of 4000+ subscribers who are downloading the podcasts into over 60 different countries around the world! For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 25 (Mar. 2011)
item.description: There is no official theme for this episode but there are many common threads that run through it. Mostly it is a collection of some really cool shit I’ve come across in the past few months. There are some other threads here though: a couple of chances to hear the distinct Morgan Page sound, the debut of my new fave DJ ‘Avicii’ on this podcast, and a good funky sound through the middle of the set. Lots to listen to and get jacked about. Enjoy the episode, tell all your friends, and cheer LOUD for spring to get here sooner with it’s warmer weather! Love the feedback, keep it coming. It helps keep the podcast alive and also helps shape the mixes. Don’t forget to check out my other project for some great new mixes: [R]evolve Sunday Sessions…a great way to recover. http://revolvesundaysessions.podomatic.com Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite “Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/pages/DJ-DLite/136245873064224 HOTracklisting: Tegan & Sara “Alligator” (Morgan Page remix) Anthony Lewis ft. item.title: Episode 24 (Feb. 2011) - Axwell Special Edition
item.description:
Welcome back!  This is a special episode…full of inspiration.  A couple of weeks ago we had the pleasure of seeing Axwell LIVE in concert and it was an amazing treat.  FREEZING cold night but he lit the club on fire with HUGE sounds, vocals, big synths, amazing sampling and of course smashing drops.  I had another episode lined up but couldn’t help myself after the concert and put it aside. 

I hope this set does a good job of conveying the happiness and energy that night.  These are a collection of songs produced and remixed by either Axwell alone or in collaboration with another artist.  Some brand new tracks and some ageless classics. 

Everyone should have the chance to hear and FEEL how good shows like that are.  There really isn’t much that some good house music can’t fix.

Let me hear from you!  Love the feedback…helps keep the podcast alive and also helps shape the mixes.

Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite

“Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/pages/DJ-DLite/136245873064224

 

 Axwell’s hot track after hot track:

Axwell ft. Steve Edwards  “Watch the Sunrise”  (Original mix)

Sunfreakz ft. Andrea Britton  “Counting Down The Days”  (Axwell vocal mix)

Axwell & Bob Sinclar ft. Ron Carroll  “What a Wonderful World”  (EDX vocal mix)

Axwell  “Nothin But Love”  (Classic mix)

Dirty South & Axwell  “Open Your Heart”  (Vocal mix)

Temper Traps  “Sweet Disposition”  (Axwell & Dirty South remix)

Nanchang Nancy + Prok & Fitch  “Walk With Me”  (Axwell vs. Daddy’s Groove remix)

Swedish House Mafia  “Miami 2 Ibiza”  (Orignial mix)

Adrian Lux  “Teenage Crime”  (Axwell & Henrik B remode)

TV Rock ft. Rudy  “In The Air”  (Axwell remix)

Angello, Axwell, Ingrosso, Laidback Luke  “Leave The World Behind” (Original mix)

Faithless ft. Cass Fox  “Music Matters”  (Axwell remix)

 

If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts:

1.     Help me cover the hosting and bandwidth costs, click this link to donate via PayPal and show  your support for the Podcast:  http://bit.ly/dEIO8s

2.     Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode!

For those keeping track: you are now part of 4000+ subscribers who are downloading the podcasts into over 60 different countries around the world!

KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!!

For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email:

therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 23 (December 2010)
item.description:
We’re BAAAAACCCKK!!  I’m sure you thought the podcast had fallen off the face of the earth.  Not to worry…after a fall full of volunteer work that kept me away and then a November COMPLETE equipment replacement we’re back on the air!

This episode has all the goodies I’ve been saving the past many months.  I hope this finds all of you getting into the Holiday Spirit while healthy and happy.  Just one thing…when the Christmas events start coming fast an furious and you don’t think you’ll be able to breathe for one more minute…take a time out…and RIP EPISODE 23!  It will fix all that ails you I promise.  Let this mix roll at your holiday shaker for the warm-up, the peak, or the cool down and you won’t be sorry.

Thank you for sticking around and I will see you soon with more music…I won’t make you wait that long again!  Enjoy DLite’s selection of Hot Tracks and stay warm wherever you are. 

Let me hear from you!  Love the feedback…helps keep the podcast alive and also helps shape the mixes.

Follow me on Twitter here: http://twitter.com/therealdlite

“Like” DLite on Facebook here: http://www.facebook.com/pages/DJ-DLite/136245873064224

Track listing for the 23rd DLite Scorcher is here:

1.              Temper Trap  “Love Lost”  (Keljet remix)

2.              Bob Sinclar & Ben Onono  “Rainbow of Love”  (Original mix)

3.              Nadia Ali  “Rapture”  (Avicii New Generation Extended mix)

4.              Tom Novy ft. Lima  “Now or Never”  (Lissat & Voltaxx remix)

5.              John Dahlback  “Back to the Dancefloor”  (Denis Koyu remix)

6.              Deadmau5, Wolfgang Gartner  “Animal Rights”  (Original mix)

7.              The Mashmaticians  “Much About Dre”  (Original mix)

8.              Pendulum  “The Island”  (Extended mix)

9.              Avicii  “Malo”  (Alex Gaudino & Jason Rooney remix)

10.           Martin Solveig & Dragonette  “Hello”  (Michael Woods remix)

11.           Kaskade, Adam K, SunSun  “Raining”  (Extended mix)

12.           Sam La More  “I Wish It Could Last”  (Hook n Sling remix)

13.           Nadia Ali  “Ride With Me”  (Alex Kenji Love Extended mix)

14.           BT & Andrew Bayer  “The Emergency”  (Today Is The Day remix)

Don’t forget that episodes now come equipped with CHAPTERS for your convenience ;) This means when you play this on your iPod or on iTunes you can skip through tracks on the podcast just like on a CD. Cool new feature many of you have been asking for awhile about...no more waiting: Chapters are here!

If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts:

 1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!!

 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode.

 3. Send comments via twitter, facebook or email…or post them on this site!

For those keeping track: you are now part of 4000+ subscribers around the world who are downloading the podcasts into over 60 different countries around the world!

KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!!

For bookings for your show or event, or if you have a question or comment drop me an email:

therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: The DLite Summer Sessions Part II: The Throwdown
item.description: Part II – The Throwdown – is just that: We’re throwing down the gauntlet and demanding you hit the hot summer dance floor! There’s no slowdown here, no takin’ it easy on the back porch drinking a beer. This episode is intended to rip it. Sweet Summer Celebration Style. Basically a preloaded dance party right on your ipod…and you’d better be careful where you unleash it because it’s gonna cause some asses to move! Enjoy the high energy music and use it to get all you can out of the outdoor party season ☺ Don’t forget that episodes now come equipped with CHAPTERS for your convenience ;) ! This means when you play this on your iPod or on iTunes you can skip through tracks on the podcast just like on a CD. Cool new feature many of you have been asking for awhile about...no more waiting: Chapters are here! Tracklisting for this loaded gun full of HOT TRACKS: 1. Pharrell Williams, Uffie “ADD SUV” (Armand Van Helden Vocal remix) 2. Sebastien Drums, Avicii “My Feelings For You” (Original mix) 3. Stephan M, Laurent Simeca “Roxanne” (Original mix) 4. Spencer & Hill “Cool” (Jewelz remix) 5. Kaskade ft. Dragonette “Fire In Your New Shoes” (Extended mix) 6. Fergie, David Guetta, Chris Willis, LMFAO “Getting’ Over You” (Avicii Vocal remix) 7. Swedish House Mafia “One” (Original mix) 8. Technero “One World” (TV ROCK & Luke Chable remix) 9. Rihanna “Rockstar 101” (Chew Fu Teachers Pet Fix Club mix) 10. Yves Murasca ft. Ezzy Safaris “Saxophobic Satisfaction” (2010 Club mix) 11. DJ Chus, Gonzalo “One Night In Havana” (Original mix) 12. David Guetta, Afrojack ft. Niles Mason “Louder Than Words” (Original mix) 13. Bingo Players “Tom’s Diner” (Original mix) 14. Eddie Thoneick & Eric Morillo “Live Your Life” (Original mix) Enjoy! If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!! 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode. 3. Send comments via email or post them on this site 4. Join our Facebook group: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/group.php?gid=2330328267 For those keeping track: you are now part of 3500+ subscribers around the world who are downloading the podcasts into over 56 different countries around the world! KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! For bookings for your show or event drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: The DLite Summer Sessions Part I: The Slowdown
item.description:
Summer is FULL BLOWN and DLite has got the tracks to help you squeeze every last dance move outta the great weather.  This year we present The DLite Summer Sessions Part I & II – The Slowdown and the Throwdown.  Between the two episodes I hope you’ll have enough music to get you through the absolute best time of the year.  I know that I’ve got a ton of music to share…so notwithstanding these two posts I hope for another episode before vacation begins later in July! 

 Part I  - The Slowdown – is anything but slow.  It’s more about soulful progressive beats and lyrics that are the perfect soundtrack for the daytime patio, the recovery sessions, the pre-drinks, or the late warm summer night after parties.  Need some melodic and feel good music to get you through a workday and back to the patio?  This will do it.  EDX, Adam K & Soha, Kaskade, and Pryda type feel to this one.

Since posting the last episode on March 24 we have averaged 150 downloads a day.  Whatever you’re doing is working! Keep telling your friends and sharing the music and keep the podcast growing at a terrific rate while blasting the music to over 57 countries around the globe…keep on bustin’ a move!

 Don’t forget that episodes now come equipped with CHAPTERS for your convenience! This means when you play this on your iPod or on iTunes you can skip through tracks on the podcast just like on a CD. Cool new feature many of you have been asking for awhile about...no more waiting: Chapters are here!

Progressive HOT TRACK listing for your listening pleasure:

  1. Pete Tha Zouk, Mastercris, Abigail Bailey  “I Am Back Again”  (Adam K & Soha Extended mix)
  2. Moguai  “Nu Disco”  (Original mix)
  3. Kaskade ft. Haley “Don’t Stop Dancing”  (Extended mix)
  4. EDX  “Hoover”  (Original mix)
  5. Shiny Toy Guns  “Major Tom”  (Adam K & Soha Club edit)
  6. Dirty South ft. Rudy  “Phazing”  (Original mix)
  7. Tim Berg  “Bromance”  (Avicii’s Arena mix)
  8. Cedric Gervais ft. Second Sun  “Ready Or Not”  (EDX remix)
  9. Nadia Ali  “Fantasy”  (EDX remix)
  10. DJ Tatana  “Spring Breeze”  (Martin Roth SummerStyle remix)
  11. Pryda  “Viro”  (Original mix)
  12. Dinka  “Ordinary People”  (Original mix)
  13. Libex, Marshal (aka Luigi Rocca)  “Psychic Harmony 2010”  (Original mix)

Enjoy!

 

If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts:

1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!!

2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode.

item.title: Episode 21 (March 2010)
item.description: Can you taste it? The Spring in the air? The Summer heat just around the corner? Welcome back to the ‘cast…it was a long cold February without any music posted…and I’m sorry for that ☺ The end of March always brings WMC in Miami and a TON of new crackin’ summer tracks…so before that hits I thought I’d get out some of my favourites from the last 6 weeks. Some old school remixes, Kaskade, Deadmau5 mixes, great vocals, a couple of smashers in the middle, and some good progressive to close it out. So…crank up the volume and move your ass…especially if you’re at the office SKel…give ‘em something to talk about ;) These episodes now have chapters…so you can skip through the tracks like they’re on a CD. Take advantage of that on iTunes or your iPod. Enjoy the music and don’t forget to tell all of your friends! Looking forward to the Summer…here’s to a great outdoor music/party season! See you on the dancefloor!! A listing of the HOT TRACKS to get you warmed up for all the fun to come: 1. Medina “You and I” (Deadmau5 remix) 2. Kaskade & Seamus Haji ft. Haley “So Far Away” (Original mix) 3. Sunfreakz ft. Andrea Britton “Counting Down The Days” (Axwell Vocal mix) 4. Sam La More “I Wish It Could Last” (Original mix) 5. David Guetta ft. Kid Cudi “Memories” (Extended mix) 6. Tag Team, Doodge & Viper “Whoomp! There It Is” (Housecat remix) 7. Steve Aoki ft. Zuper Blahq “I’m In The House” (Original mix) 8. Mid-Week Shopping Club “Ghetto Star” (D.O.N.S. Vocal mix) 9. Ultra Nate “Free” (Teo Moss & Daniel Shems remix) 10. Laselva “Mr. Wiseguy” (Manuel de la Mare mash) 11. Kelis “Acapella” (David Guetta re-edit) 12. Rasmus Faber “Are You Ready” (Kaskade remix) 13. Christian Weber ft. Jay Rocves “Up” (Club mix) 14. Dinka “Elements” (EDX’s 5un5hine remix) Enjoy! If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!! 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode. 3. Send comments via email or post them on this site 4. Join our Facebook group: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/group.php?gid=2330328267 5. item.title: Episode 20 (January 2010)
item.description: Well…back at it MUCH sooner than usual! In the 10 days since the last episode we haven’t had ONE day under 100 downloads…so thank you thank you thank you!! Day one was a record 300+ downloads…keep it coming strong and spread the word! I had a big list of music that was just dying to get out to all of you…which equals your SECOND episode for January 2010…so spoiled =). Enjoy the music and remember to tell all of your friends! This one has a bit of everything…my version of Indie House, some deeper tracks, a great Kaskade remix, a really cool, bangin Armand Van Heldan mix, and of course three Progressive tracks to finish the episode out. Altogether a pretty good arc I think. I hope this helps get you through the January blues…remember to jack the volume when you need a boost!! Please don’t hesitate to leave comments via email, this webpage, and of course on the wall of our Facebook group!! Don’t forget that episodes now come equipped with CHAPTERS for your convenience ;) ! This means when you play this on your iPod or on iTunes you can skip through tracks just like on a CD. Cool new feature many of you have been asking for awhile about...no more waiting: Chapters are here! Here is the listing of HOT TRACKS to help thaw your frigid winter nights: 1. Calvin Harris “Flashback” (Original mix) 2. Dennis Ferrer “Hey Hey” (DF’s Attention Vocal mix) 3. Milk & Sugar ft. Ayak “You Got Me Burnin” (Syke ‘n’ Sugarstarr remix) 4. David Vendetta “I Hope She Turns Around” (D.O.N.S remix) 5. Paul Gardner & Hugh Gunnell ft. Marcella Woods “Come Get My Lovin” (Plastik Funk remix) 6. Yeah Yeah Yeahs “Heads Will Roll” (Club mix) 7. Ou Est Le Swimming Pool “Dance The Way I Feel” (Armand Van Helden Club mix) 8. Empire Of The Sun “Walking On a Dream” (Kaskade remix) 9. Wippenberg “Pong” (Extended mix) 10. Deadmau5 “Strobe” (Club edit) 11. Jaytech & Boom Jinx “Milano” (Original mix) Enjoy! If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. item.title: Episode 19 (Jan. 2010) - The Swedish House Mafia
item.description: Before I get into the deets of the episode, I wanted to give you all a heads up that this is the first episode with CHAPTERS! This means when you play this on your ipod or on itunes you can skip through tracks just like on a CD. Cool new feature many of you have been asking for awhile about...no more waiting: Chapters are here! This episode is all about BIG house music at its best. BIG sound that gets better the louder it gets so turn it up!! First couple of songs will ease you in…but get ready to go! The Swedish House Mafia is a group loosely formed by three very talented and high profile DJ/Producer/Remixers from – you guessed it – Sweden. Axwell, Steve Angello and Sebastian Ingrosso are all known for their big synths and big energy inspiring sounds and together it’s a hell of a combination. Depending on who you talk to Eric Prydz (Pryda) could also be included, although either way he is a legend unto himself and deserves to be here. Their annual parties at WMC in Miami and new weeklies in Ibiza are already known for consistently tearing the house down in the few years they’ve been throwing them. So, with some pent up energy I decided to turn to them for inspiration for Episode 19: The Swedish House Mafia. This is definitely peak hour stuff and best used to get your ass movin’…so in the gym, on the dancefloor, cleaning the house...or maybe like SKel sometimes you need a bang of a jump in the morning, or need to rock the office at work...if so fire up this mix! =) Here’s the tracklisting for this hot track after hot track DLite Session inspired by the Swedish House Mafia: 1. Roger Sanchez “Turn on the Music” (Axwell remix) 2. C-Mos “2 Million Ways” (Axwell remix) 3. Steve Angello, Axwell, Sebastian Ingrosso, Laidback Luke “Leave The World Behind” (Original mix) 4. Dirty South ft. Rudy “Let It Go” (Axwell remix) 5. Axwell & Dirty South “Open Your Heart” (Vocal mix) 6. Steve Angello & Laidback Luke ft. Robin S “Show Me Love 2009” (Extended original mix) 7. TV Rock ft. Rudy “In The Air” (Axwell remix) 8. Steve Angello “Tivoli” (Original mix) 9. David Guetta, Sebastian Ingrosso, Dirty South ft. Julie McKnight “How Soon Is Now” (Extended Version) 10. Temper Traps “Sweet Disposition” (Axwell & Dirty South remix) 11. Eric Prydz “Pjanoo” (Original mix) 12. Sebastian Ingrosso “Laktos” (Original mix) Enjoy! If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!! 2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode. 3. Send comments via email or post them on this site 4. Join our Facebook group: http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/group.php?gid=2330328267 For those keeping track: you are now part of 3000+ subscribers around the world who are downloading the podcasts into over 56 different countries around the world! KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! For bookings for your show or event drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 18 (Nov 2009) - SPECIAL EDITION KASKADE INSPIRED
item.description:
HI ALL, and welcome back!!  Its been a very busy and eventful layoff   But now that some clarity has descended on life again its time to moooooove on and get back to the music!!

I expect to post a regular Episode 19 in short order (hopefully the next two weeks) as I’ve got a collection of tracks that are bangers and just itching to get out of your speakers…but for now you’ve got this SPECIAL EDITION DLITE SESSION to keep you going. 

This Friday we had the pleasure of seeing Kaskade live here in Calgary…and this time he was awesome enough to sprinkle quite a few of his own tracks into his set that had a decidedly progressive slant to it.  It was a very melodic and feel good night with Kaskade at the helm…so much so that I was inspired to put together my favourite tracks of his, along with some other tracks that share this or that with Kaskade’s signature style and sound, into a feel good mix.  EDX and Deadmau5 are influences here for sure as well.  Above all else:  Listen, feel, and escape to a better place….

 

I would be remiss if I didn’t give S Kel big credit here for giving me an awesome reason to get this done…because noone likes driving that far without good music right?

Here is the tracklisting for this “Kaskade Inspired” DLite Session:

  1. Haley  “This Is How It Goes”  (Kaskade’s Grand Club edit)
  2. Kaskade  “Angel On My Shoulder”  (EDX Belo Horizonte At Night remix)
  3. Kaskade  “Move For Me”  (Deadmau5 remix)
  4. Morgan Page ft. Lissie “Longest Road”  (Deadmau5 remix)
  5. Calvin Harris  “I’m Not Alone”  (Deadmau5 remix)
  6. Yves Larock ft. Jaba  “Say Yeah”  (EDX Ibiza Sunrise remix)
  7. Kaskade  “It’s You, It’s Me”  (More Vox remix)
  8. Late Night Alumni  “Another Chance”  (Kaskade’s Homage to Roger remix)
  9. Pryda  “Melo”  (Original mix)
  10. Kaskade  “4AM”  (Adam K & Soha mix)

 

If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts:

1. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible!!

2. Subscribe through the iTunes Store (search djdlite) so you never miss an episode.

3. Send comments via email or post them on this site

4. Join our Facebook group: (http://www.facebook.com/home.php?#/group.php?gid=2330328267)

 

Enjoy the Music!

For those keeping track: you are now part of 3000+ subscribers around the world who are downloading the podcasts into over 55 different countries around the world!

KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!!

 

For bookings for your show or event drop me an email: therealdlite@gmail.com

item.title: Episode 16 (Mar. 2009) - 2 YEAR ANNIVERSARY
item.description: WOW…another long layoff! New software and equipment all around has made for an interesting transition…and hopefully much better sets. My apologies to all of you who have waited since Christmas for more beats. Spring is in the air (barely) and here’s a LONG mix for the many of you who are looking to celebrate the end of winter with some crackin’ tracks! Also, I may be making my way across the pond this summer (or next) for a long vacation…any opportunities for gigs on the British Isles? Let me know if you know of something!! Here is the tracklisting for your Springtime Hot Tracks: 1. Doman & Gooding ft. Dru & Lincoln “Runnin’” (Main mix) 2. Granite & Phunk w MC Flipside “So Fly” (Vocal mix) 3. Spencer & Hill “Young Love” (Original mix) 4. Steve Angello & Laidback Luke “Show Me Love” (Extended mix) 5. Juan Kidd & Felix Baumgartner ft. Lisa Millett “Now You’re Gone” (Club mix) 6. Kurd Maverick “Blue Monday” (Vandalism remix) 7. Houseshaker “Yes We Can” (Saw mix) 8. Kid Cudi vs. Crookers “Day n’ Nite” (Mobin Master mix) 9. ATFC ft. Rae “Giv Me Luv” (Ocean Trench mix) 10. Dirty Vegas “Pressure” (Sultan & Ned Shepard mix) 11. Jason Herd ft. Roland Clark “I Feel Good” (Juan Kidd remix) 12. David Penn & Rober Gaez “Our Darkness” (Original mix) 13. Faithless ft. Cass Fox “Music Matters” (Mark Knight remix) 14. Gui Boratto “No Turning Back” (Original mix) 15. Hoxton Whores “Devil Toy” (Main mix) 16. Calvin Harris “I’m Not Alone” (Deadmau5 remix) KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! 2 year anniversary of podcasting on the web and kickin' these tracks out around the globe!! That is INCREDIBLE thanks to all of you!! Growing strong here at the DLite Podcast and that never gets old to me! 2800+ subscribers and over 53 countries worldwide amazes me everytime I read it. A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite77@gmail.com If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. item.title: Episode 15- Holiday Beats (December 2008)
item.description: To celebrate the start of the Holiday season here are some ‘Holiday Beats’ for your enjoyment. When the family, the relatives, the traffic, the shopping and the season start to get their grip on you what do you do? You close your eyes…you turn it up…and you RIP DLite and you FORGET about all the BS this season can bring and focus on the important things… Finally, I want to wish EACH and EVERYONE of you that subscribes and listens to this podcast a wonderful holiday season! I hope the next year brings all of you happiness and crackin’ tracks for the perfect times. Your continued support is all I’m asking for this Christmas… Here is Holiday Hot Track after Holiday Hot Track: 1. Robbie Rivera ft. Rooster & Peralta “Move Move” (Alex Gaudino & Jerry Rooney mix) 2. Axwell & Bob Sinclair ft. Ron Carroll “What a Wonderful World” (EDX Vocal mix) 3. Ministry of Funk “Way Back” (Clubzound remix) 4. Niki Belucci “Get Up” (D.O.N.S & DBN Meeting At The Beauty Salon mix) 5. DJ Disciple & Dru Hepkins “When I Die” (Prock & Fitch remix) 6. Mischa Daniels ft. Crown “Another Place” (Maximal D Essed mix) 7. Wiley ft. Daniel Merriweather “Cash In My Pocket” (Out of Office mix) 8. Alex Gaudino & J. Rooney “I Love Rock N’ Roll” (Dabruck & Klein remix) 9. Celeda & Daniel Tenaglia “Music Is The Answer” (Gabriel Vezzola mix) 10. Steve Smooth, JJ Flores, & Collette “Stay” (John Dahlback remix) 11. Pussycat Dolls “I Hate This Part” (Dave Aude remix) KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! Just under 2 years podcasting on the web and kickin' these tracks out around the globe. Growing strong here at the DLite Podcast and that never gets old to me! 2500+ subscribers and over 50 countries worldwide amazes me everyday. A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the Music!

item.title: Episode 14 - The Return
item.description: Welcome back, welcome back! After taking a few months off to deal with football season and the coaching it brings for me I'm BACK with "Episode 14 - The Return". This episode features some of my favourite tracks from the past couple of months and I'm SURE its gonna rip your speakers - "Bang that Box" as Roger Sanchez would say - and tear the house down no matter which way you choose to use it!! Although each fall I've got to take some time away from the music, the hot track after hot track is never far away. Here's the track listing for "The Return": 1. Roland Clark & The Montanas "Music Talking" (D.O.N.S & DBN remix) 2. The Shapeshifters "Lola's Theme" (2008 Re-Edit) 3. Pryda "Rakfunk" (Original mix) 4. Ce Ce Peniston "Finally 2008" (The Kam Denny & Paul Zala remix) 5. Bingo Players vs. Chocolate Puma "Touch Me" (Bart B More remix) 6. Dr. Kucho! "Groover's Delight" (Original mix) 7. David Guetta "Tomorrow Can Wait" (Tocadisco Evil mix) 8. Roger Sanchez ft. Terri B. "Bang that Box" (Laidback Luke remix) 9. DJ Exacta "Sweat" (Baggi Begovic remix) 10. Spencer & Hill "Right On Time" (Original mix) 11. DJ Joe K & Beto Dias "Born Slippy" (Original mix) 12. Dirty South & Axwell "Open Your Heart" (Vocal mix) 13. Kaskade "Angel On My Shoulder" (EDX's Belo Horizonte At Night remix) KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! After almost 18 months podcasting on the web and kickin' these tracks out around the globe we're growing strong here at the DLite podcast and that never gets old to me! 2200+ subscribers and over 50 countries worldwide amazes me everyday. A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. item.title: Houseboat Sessions 2008 (Episode 12)
item.description: Here it is...another year and another RIPPING two nights at Nielson Beach, Shuswap Lakes, B.C., Canada. The Saturday night raging beach party was by far the best we've seen on our boating trips and we'll be looking to top it next summer! WARNING: This is a BIG mix...approx 2 Hours and 15 Minutes. Have some patience with the download - any problems let me know. I've put together a HUGE mix here for memory's sake...some tracks from all over the range. Poppy to get started, some progressive mixed in, some massive drops, and of course darker and dirtier as it goes along. The last track is completely mocking of George W. Bush...I love it. I hope the mix is successful in getting across how much energy was on the beach those two nights. It really was electrifying...and I hope you enjoy listening to this mix as much as I loved playing to the beach and then recording the set. Here's the massive tracklisting for the hot track after hot track filled Houseboat Sessions 2008: 1. Katy Perry "I Kissed a Girl" (Jason Nevins remix) 2. Lady Gaga "Just Dance" (HCCRS Bambossa remix) 3. Nelly Furtado ft. Timaland "Give It To Me" (Electro mix) 4. Timberlake vs. Fedde Le Grand "Sexyback in Detroit" (DJ Lova House mix) 5. Madonna ft. Timberlake "4 Minutes" (Bob Sinclair Space Funk remix) 6. Daft Punk "One More Time" (House Moguls remix) 7. Michael Jackson "Thriller" (Eric Prydz Bootleg) 8. Digital Mode ft. Marteen "The Rhythm Of The Night" 9. Out of Office "Break of Dawn" (Club mix) 10. Big World & Denis the Menace "Fired Up" (Zoo Brazil remix) 11. Eddie Thoneick "I Wanna Freak U" (Kurd Maverick mix) 12. Dave Guetta ft. JD Davis "The World Is Mine" (F*ck Me I'm Famous remix) 13. Kaskade "4 AM" (Adam K Soha mix) 14. Morgan Page ft. Lissie "The Longest Road" (Deadmau5 remix) 15. Mastiksoul "Jacobino" (Original mix) 16. R.I.O "Shine On" (Spencer & Hill remix) 17. Sharam "Get Wild" (Original mix) 18. Michael Mind "Ride Like The Wind" (Klass remix) 19. Run DMC "Its Like That" (Bodyrox remix) 20. Armand Van Helden "I Want Your Soul" (Original mix) 21. George Morel & SPJ "Let's Take Drugs" (Cedric Gervais remix) For PHOTOS of the raging nights check out our FACEBOOK group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e KEEP IT COMING PLEASE!! After a year and a half podcasting on the web and kickin' these tracks out around the globe we're growing strong here at the DLite podcast and that never gets old to me! 2000+ subscribers and over 50 countries worldwide amazes me everyday. A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Join our mailing list or Facebook group so you never miss an episode! 3. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the Music!

item.title: Episode 11 (July 2008)
item.description: Well well well...July has rolled around, the Stampede is about to hit full swing here in Calgary and DLite has finally got some summer beats to help rock away the hot weather!! As is with the image selected for the episode art this hour long cracker is all about moooovin' on. Take the beats, the energy, and message how you will - but bottom line let it ENERGIZE you and get moving! This episode is full of vocal bangers that have become a custom around here so handle the heat with care! It would seem that 'Double Shots' are also becoming a tradition - and so this month the honour goes to David Guetta. I had the privilege of seeing him live here in Calgary in April and the show was S.I.C.K. What a talent and inspiration...and the double shot will be just a taste of how hard he rocked that night. Here is the track listing for 2008's first summer hot tracks to hit the airwaves: 1. Out of Office "Break of Dawn" (club mix) 2. Nadia Ali "Crash And Burn" (Sultan & Ned Shepard remix) 3. Delerium ft. Sarah McLaclan "Silence" (Niels van Gogh vs. Thomas Gold remix) 4. Snap! "Rhythm Is A Dancer" (Tom Novy remix) 5. Anna Grace "You Make Me Feel" (extended mix) 6. David Guetta ft. Tara McDonald "Delirious" (Arno Cost & Norman Doray remix) 7. David Guetta ft. Cozi "Baby When The Light" (David Guetta & Fred Rister remix) 8. Big World/Denis the Menace "Fired Up" (Zoo Brazil mix) 9. D.O.N.S vs. DBN ft. Kadoc "The Nighttrain" (In On Board remix) 10. Mastiksoul "Jacobino" (Original mix) 11. Dobenbeck ft. Joanna "Please Don't Go" (Chris Reece Dub) 12. Robert M "I Love House" (Original mix) FACEBOOK GROUP: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e Keep it coming!! item.dc:creator: DJ DLite
item.itunes:summary:
Well well well...July has rolled around, the Stampede is about to hit full swing here in Calgary and DLite has finally got some summer beats to help rock away the hot weather!! As is with the image selected for the episode art this hour long cracker is all about moooovin' on. Take the beats, the energy, and message how you will - but bottom line let it ENERGIZE you and get moving!
This episode is full of vocal bangers that have become a custom around here so handle the heat with care! It would seem that 'Double Shots' are also becoming a tradition - and so this month the honour goes to David Guetta. I had the privilege of seeing him live here in Calgary in April and the show was S.I.C.K. What a talent and inspiration...and the double shot will be just a taste of how hard he rocked that night. Here is the track listing for 2008's first summer hot tracks to hit the airwaves:
1. Out of Office "Break of Dawn" (club mix) 2. Nadia Ali "Crash And Burn" (Sultan & Ned Shepard remix) 3. Delerium ft. Sarah McLaclan "Silence" (Niels van Gogh vs. Thomas Gold remix) 4. Snap! "Rhythm Is A Dancer" (Tom Novy remix) 5. Anna Grace "You Make Me Feel" (extended mix) 6. David Guetta ft. Tara McDonald "Delirious" (Arno Cost & Norman Doray remix) 7. David Guetta ft. Cozi "Baby When The Light" (David Guetta & Fred Rister remix) 8. Big World/Denis the Menace "Fired Up" (Zoo Brazil mix) 9. D.O.N.S vs. DBN ft. Kadoc "The Nighttrain" (In On Board remix) 10. Mastiksoul "Jacobino" (Original mix) 11. Dobenbeck ft. Joanna "Please Don't Go" (Chris Reece Dub) 12. Robert M "I Love House" (Original mix)
FACEBOOK GROUP: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e
(continued)

item.title: Episode 10 (April 2008)
item.description: WOW! That took forever!! Thanks for all of your patience waiting for Episode 10 to drop…the best explanation I have is that life got in the way a couple of times the last few months. Never to fear though, DLite is back with a vengeance. Episode 10 by design is a peak hour mix and so it pounds from start to finish! Definitely less funky than usual and much much dirtier with electro and progressive touches to be sure. Spring is in the air (here in Canada anyway) and you should absolutely let the energy of the music pull you out of you winter numbness…beats and summer were made for each other and this is the perfect start! We’re still kickin’ the music out to 50+ countries around the globe and the listenership is growing strong…thanks in no small part to all of you who pass the music onto your friends and let them know where to find the hottest tracks! A HUGE thanks for all those who return faithfully for each episode and lend their feedback...it is much appreciated! Hot track after hot track after hot track and suddenly the snow begins to melt… 1. Craig Obey vs. The Church “Under the Milky Way” (Craig Obey remix) 2. Fedde Le Grand “Get This Feeling” (Original mix) 3. H Two O ft. Platnum “Whats It Gonna Be” (Vandalism remix) 4. Donny Darko “We Need To Wake Up” (Lukaman remix) 5. Fragma “Toca’s Miracle” (Inpetto remix) 6. David Guetta “Love Is Gone” (Fred Rister & Joachim Garraud remix) 7. Alex Romano “Get Down (Rock It Up)” (Bass Kleph remix) 8. Eric Prydz “Sweet Genesis” 9. Eric Prydz “Pjanoo” (Original mix) **YES a double shot of Prydz** 10. Digital Mode ft. Marteen “The Rhythm of The Night" (Original mix) 11. Sheldon Romero ft. Betty Brooklyn “Dirty Things” (Gnewkow Norm remix) 12. Paolo Mojo “1983" (Pryda remix) Remember,: Episode 11 will be a “Greatest Hits”aka One year anniversary episode with a couple of tracks chosen from each of the previous episodes and compiled into a reflective mix for the podcast. Get your feedback in and let us know which tracks you’d like to hear in the new mix! FACEBOOK GROUP: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e Keep it coming!! A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Join our mailing list or Facebook group so you never miss an episode! 3. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the music!!

item.title: Episode 9 (Jan. 2008)
item.description: After ANOTHER long wait we’re back again! Busy busy holiday season visiting family and playing some events made pushing out a podcast pretty tough the last little while. Not to worry though because we’re back with plenty of funky beats for your 2008 enjoyment! This episode starts off with some familiar funky vocal tracks before moving on midway through the mix to some tighter beats…hope you enjoy the set! We’re still kickin’ the music out to 50+ countries around the globe and the listenership is growing strong…thanks in no small part to all of you who pass the music onto your friends and let them know where to find the hottest tracks! ‘Winter’ and ‘Hot’ in the same sentence?? Absolutely stone cold winter hot track listing: 1. I Don’t Care “I Don’t Care” (Haitras remix) 2. Jerry Ropero & DTM “Time To Turn Around” (Full Vocal mix) 3. R.A.W. ft. Amanda Wilson “Intoxicated” 4. Blaze “Do You Remember House” (Bob Sinclair remix) 5. Stonebridge “You Don’t Know” (Hott 22 remix) 6. Degrees of Motion “Do You Want It Right Now” (Funktion remix) 7. Syke n’ Sugarstarr “Danz” (Extended mix) 8. Global Deejays ft. Technotronic “Get Up” (Maurizio Gubellini mix) 9. Funkerman “Speed Up” (Original mix) 10. Bob Sinclair & Steve Edwards “Together” (Eddie Thoneick Vocal mix) 11. Cristian Marchi “We Are Perfect” (Main Vocal Mix) 12. Global Deejays ft. Rozalla “Everybody’s Free” (General Electric mix) 13. Talisman & Hudson “Leaving Planet Earth” (Dousk remix) 14. Seal “Amazing” (Thin White Duke Main mix) **FEEDBACK REQUEST** This month I’d LOVE to hear about where, when, during what party or in what situation you rocked the podcasts! Drop me a line with some wicked stories!! WHERE can you leave your stories for me? Leave comments here on our webpage, on iTunes (search djdlite), or you can join our Facebook group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e Keep it coming!! A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and all of the work very very worthwhile! For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Join our mailing list or Facebook group so you never miss an episode! 3. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the music!!

item.title: Episode 8 (Nov. 2007)
item.description: A long wait after the last 'cast and Episode 8 is finally here! Had some tech issues switching to a Mac platform, but with those almost resolved I FINALLY got to unload a mix. Two months of pent up energy has come tearing out in the form of Episode 8 and it’s a Ripper!! It definitely has an Electro slant to the set, but not without the touch of Funk and Vocals that are Dlite staples. I hope you enjoy listening to the mix as much as I enjoyed making it! Thanks to all of you who wrote with comments of encouragement while asking for the next episode...clearly at just over 4000 subscribers this podcast wasn't forgotten in the absence of a fresh mix! Now that we're back up, we'll do our best to get you bangin' funky house mixes as often as we can! Hot Track after Hot Track in Episode 8: 1. Whelan & Di Scala "Sunset to Sunrise" 2. Peplab "E.T" (Peplab's Classix Treat mix) 3. T-Empo ft. Juliet Roberts "Saturday Night Sunday Morning" (Digital Dog remix) 4. Dave Armstrong & Redroche "Love Has Gone" 5. Fun Da Mentalists ft. One "World Wide Party" (Hoxton Whores Vocal mix) 6. Disco Freaks "Take Me 2 the Sun" (Freemasons remix) 7. Big Bass vs. Michelle Narine "What You Do" (Thomas Gold remix) 8. Grant Nelson "Seasons of Jack" (Jesse Garcia Piano mix) 9. Michael Mind "Ride Like the Wind" (Klaas remix) 10. DJ Jeroenski "Back Once Again" (Vandalism remix) 11. R.I.O "R.I.O" (SH Project remix) 12. Pryda "Armed" Don't forget, we love the feedback, so keep it coming! You can join our Facebook group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and very very worthwhile. For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Join our mailing list or Facebook group so you never miss an episode! 3. Let others know, leave your comments on our iTunes Podcast page. 4. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the music!!

item.title: Episode 7
item.description: So the first leaves of Autumn have fallen...so what? It doesn't mean the music stops! What it does mean is that we can move back inside and rip the beats the way they were meant to be ripped! With Dlite's help the music and the summer memories will surely keep us all warm right through until spring... Unreal how the podcasts have taken off...now just over 1900 Subscribers and still pumping the house into 50+ countries around the globe!! Don't forget, we love the feedback, so keep it coming! You can join our Facebook group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e The tracks for Episode 7? Does Autumn even have Hot Tracks?? You bet! 1. Jani & Eric Euwe ft. Eve Lyn "You Gotta Feel Free" 2. Julia St. Louis "Change" (Relight Orchestra mix) 3. Chris Montana "Porto Hustle" (Chris Ortega mix) 4. Eddie Thoneick ft. Bonse "Together As One" (Vocal mix) 5. Ida Corr "Let Me Think About It" (Fedde Le Grand remix) 6. The Freaks "The Creeps" (Vandalism mix) 7. Starsplash "Cold As Ice" (Rubberboy remix) 8. Spektrum "Kinda New" (Dirty South remix) 9. Deltaware "Tear It Up" (Funk Manouver mix) 10. Vinylshakerz "Forget Me Nots" (Soft Mode mix) 11. Big World "Morning Light" (Feel That Vibe mix) A HUGE thanks to everyone who supports this podcast...it makes all of this possible and worthwhile. For bookings or more info email: djdlite@shaw.ca If you enjoy the mixes and the 'casts: 1. Send comments via email or post them on this site! 2. Join our mailing list or Facebook group so you never miss an episode! 3. Let others know, leave your comments on our iTunes Podcast page. 4. Donate via Paypal to help me keep this Podcast going, your support makes this podcast possible! Enjoy the music!!

item.title: Houseboat Sessions 2007
item.description: As always the summer brought us two raging nights rockin' Neilson Beach in the Shuswap, British Columbia, Canada. DJ-Dlite played a five hour set each night on the beach and almost brought the roof down (literally) – some of my favourite tracks from the last six months. Rooftop patio, fireworks, full moon, perfect breeze, summer vacation for many and WICKED music! Unfortunately we can't put the sessions in their entirety up here, but we've put together a mix of songs an hour and a half long that had the crowd pumping their fists for more! Check out pictures of the event here: http://www.facebook.com/album.php?aid=3825&l=7304c&id=511522930 ...and join our FaceBook group here: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=2330328267&pwstdfy=8faf8c042b759d8781ad55c5d9d3c44e Here's the tracklisting for the mix of Houseboat Hot Tracks: 1. Bob Sinclair “Sound of Freedom” 2. Armand Van Helden “I Want Your Soul” 3. Fireflies ft. Alexandria Prince “I Can’t Get Enough” 4. Chanel “My Life” (Seamus & Haji remix) 5. Fonzerelli “I Love Music” (Yer Man remix) 6. Martijn Ten Velden “I Wish You Would” (Hook & Sling remix) 7. Bob Sinclair “Yes U R” 8. Funkerman & Fedde Le Grand “Wheels in Motion” 9. Turbofunk “Gotta Move” (Air Bureau remix) 10. DJ Chus & David Penn “We Play House” (David Vendetta remix) 11. Fedde Le Grand “Put Your Hands Up for Detroit” 12. M.Y.N.C Project “R U Sure” (Ran Shani remix) 13. Lys ft. Nic Kat “82-86” (Electro mix) 14. Barcelona’s Best “Scenes I Can’t Deny” 15. Alibi vs. Rockefeller “Sexual Healing” (Dennis Christopher mix) 16. DJ Disciple ft. Suzy “Yes” (Ian Carey remix) 17. Bob Sinclair “Rock This Party” 18. Supafly Inc. “Moving Too Fast” (Northwest remix) Enjoy the mix while you wait for Episode 7 late in August, and see you in the Shuswap for Rage on the Lake 2008! For bookings or more information email: djdlite@shaw.ca
